name: Alone Against The Siege
description:
Alone Against The Siege is a 2D side-scrolling metroidvania with a focus on ranged combat and mobility. You alone must defend your home planet from alien invaders and find a way to defeat them.

The game is currently in early development and the playable demo showcases exclusively the movement options that will be available to the player in the full game. You are welcome to give feedback on how the game controls so far.
